prompts.title: One for the road.
prompts.description: Have a drink to get things going.

prompts.title: Two for two
prompts.description: Two drinks for looking too sober. Cheers!

prompts.title: Three's a breeze.
prompts.description: Three healthy sips for you.

prompts.title: Chugging time
prompts.description: Finish your drink immediately! Hope you haven't poured out a new one!

prompts.title: Guardian Angel
prompts.description: Someone above is looking out for you! Safe from drinking for an entire round.

prompts.title: Shots! Shots! Shots!
prompts.description: It's that time again! Take a shot!

prompts.title: Drinksgiving!
prompts.description: Time to share your love with another player! Pick another person to have a drink with you!

prompts.title: You there!
prompts.description: Will you be a merciful chooser? Pick one player to take a drink!

prompts.title: Plea the fifth
prompts.description: Let's face it, you've said enough already. Stay silent for the entire round, each time you speak results in a drink.

prompts.title: Sober time
prompts.description: You're looking worse for wear. Take a drink of water/mixer.

prompts.title: Full house
prompts.description: Take as many drinks as there are players playing including you

prompts.title: Go woke, go broke
prompts.description: Tell a controversial opinion, then drink once.

prompts.title: Four eyes
prompts.description: People who wear glasses drink.

prompts.title: Comedy night
prompts.description: Tell your best joke or take a drink, players who laugh will have to drink.

prompts.title: Tipsy bartender
prompts.description: Name a mixed drink, everyone has to guess the ingredients of that drink. The player who gets the least ingredients right has to drink.

prompts.title: Chug jug
prompts.description: Everyone chugs their drinks for 10 seconds.

prompts.title: Just dance!
prompts.description: Everyone shows their best dance moves, and the player who gets the least votes drinks.

prompts.title: Slim Shady
prompts.description: It's time to bust out the rhymes. First player says a word and the next has to rhyme with it. Whoever fails the rhyme has to take a drink.

prompts.title: Encyclopaedia
prompts.description: Hope you have some book smarts with you. Go around telling your most interesting fact! Most boring fact has to take a drink.

prompts.title: No hoes?
prompts.description: Sorry for this one. Virgins drink!

prompts.title: Tequila
prompts.description: Woop woop! Everyone drinks!

prompts.title: Seal of approval
prompts.description: Thumbs up! At any point during the game you can raise your thumb. The last person to follow suit has to drink!

prompts.title: Mexican wave
prompts.description: Start doing a Mexican wave. Whoever fails must drink!

prompts.title: U up?
prompts.description: Let's get chatty! Send a message to a person outside the group, if that person does not answer back within an X amount of time, you drink. If they do, everyone else drinks.

prompts.title: 5head
prompts.description: Let that big ol' forehead get some love. Biggest forehead takes a drink.

prompts.title: Baby face
prompts.description: Keeping it smooth I see. People without facial hair drinks.

prompts.title: Long Boi
prompts.description: You can't pin this one on us. Player with the longest name drinks.

prompts.title: Sober Steve
prompts.description: Being frugal has cost you. Player with the most amount of drink in their glass has to take a drink.

prompts.title: Giraffe
prompts.description: We respect your life choices, you respect the drink. Vegans take a drink.

prompts.title: Selfie time!
prompts.description: Put on those smiley faces! Take a selfie with the group and take a drink

prompts.title: Truth or drink?
prompts.description: Ask truth or dare from someone, if the don't want to answer or do the dare, they must drink.

prompts.title: States the facts
prompts.description: Hope you paid attention in class! Name US states until one of you is unable to, whoever fails has to drink.

prompts.title: Heisenberg
prompts.description: Jesse! Jesse!. Name chemistry elements until one of you is unable to, loser drinks.

prompts.title: I'm shy :(
prompts.description: Tell your most embarrassing moment to the group, if you donâ€™t want to, drink 3 times.

prompts.title: Breaking the seal
prompts.description: Your tiny bladder shall be your downfall. The next person to use the toilet must finish their drink.

prompts.title: Woof! Woof!
prompts.description: You wanna treat? Bark like a dog for a whole round.

prompts.title: Look mom, no hands!
prompts.description: Let's see how skilled you are! Everyone drinks without using the hands.

prompts.title: Arrr
prompts.description: Ahoy there mateys! Talk like a pirate for 3 rounds.

prompts.title: Double trouble
prompts.description: Each drink is doubled.

prompts.title: Meooooooooww
prompts.description: Meow like a cat for a whole round.
